#summary Setting up xapian for tcl via macports

  # install tcl: 
{{{
port install tcl
}}}
  # Add a variant to: /opt/local//var/macports/sources/rsync.macports.org/release/ports/devel/xapian-bindings/Portfile
{{{
variant     tcl description {builds tcl bindings} {
  configure.args-delete  --without-tcl
  configure.args-append  --with-tcl
  depends_lib-append port:tcl
} 
}}}
  # install xapian-bindings: 
{{{
port install xapian-bindings +tcl
}}}
  # install tcllib: 
{{{
port install tcllib
}}}
  # fix the xapian library for tcl:
{{{ 
cp /opt/local//lib/xapian1.0.15/xapian.so /opt/local//lib/xapian1.0.15/xapian.dylib
}}}
